original_title: Six Sri Lankans sent by human traffickers to join Russian military confirmed dead
original_body_lines: Investigations carried out so far have revealed that six Sri Lankans sent to Russia by human traffickers to join the military have died, Police Media Spokesman DIG Nihal Thalduwa said.
Meanwhile, the Police Spokesman also assured that further investigations are in progress to find out the exact number of individuals involved with the matter.
